Firas Alsuah is a syrian intellectual researcher was born in the city of Homs / Syria examine the mythology and history of religions as an entry point for understanding the spiritual dimension in humans.

The Godess Ishtar's secret is a mystery book months and a review of the role of the first human goddess Ishtar and its role in the formation and installation of communities as we know it today and their implications pillar visible in our daily lives.
